name: Merry Christmas 1944
description:
Merry Christmas 1944, the bombs are falling outside, covering the city with ash and dust, creating a magical winter war wonderland. German and British planes are dancing on the black sky lit with explosions and the infantry is marching to the sound of jingling bells. And in all of this poor old Santa has to do his Job. Luckily he's got you, Rudolf to Protect him and his Sleigh.

WASD to move, don't let Bombs, Planes and missiles hit you and most importantly have fun.

All sounds excluding the music are from freesound.org everything else was made by me and my teammate
